name: Asian Girl Makeover
description:
Indian girls have their unique beauty. They completes their unique beauty with their special and colorful clothes.

This beautiful girl name is Jenny and she wants to learn new things about the Indian fashion. Today, she wants to wear traditional Indian outfits for her friend's wedding Reception. For that, she needs some help from a stylish girl like you to give her a gorgeous look. Check out all those traditional clothes and accessories, mix, match and put together a lovely-chic outfit and dress her up with the chosen ones. A little bit of eyeshadow, a little bit of candy color on her lips, a thin layer of blush and a black coat of mascara will surely make a chic team with her lovely looks.

Enjoy it!
